attributes.action: STOP IMMIGRATION. this will reduce an over crowded country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stop ALL immigration NOW, this would save the country a fortune also we would not have to build anymore homes or at least at the rate the government wishes them to at the present time.
NO IMMIGRATION, LESS HOMES, CUTS CARBON, SAVES OUR RESOUCES ie water/gas electric etc less of everything

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "STOP IMMIGRATION. this will reduce an over crowded country."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15546.asp

Prime Minister's Office
